1.name: 1. Blade
1.description: A half-vampire, half-mortal man becomes a protector of the mortal race, while slaying evil vampires.

2.name: 2. Sex and the City
2.description: Four female New Yorkers gossip about their sex lives (or lack thereof) and find new ways to deal with being a woman in the late 1990s.

3.name: 3. Charmed
3.description: Three Halliwell sisters discover that they are descendants of a line of good female witches and are destined to fight against the forces of evil, using their combined power of witchcraft known as the "Power of Three".

4.name: 4. The Truman Show
4.description: An insurance salesman is oblivious of the fact that his entire life is a TV show and his family members are mere actors. As he starts noticing things and uncovers the truth, he decides to escape.

5.name: 5. Saving Private Ryan
5.description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

6.name: 6. American History X
6.description: Living a life marked by violence, neo-Nazi Derek finally goes to prison after killing two black youths. Upon his release, Derek vows to change; he hopes to prevent his brother, Danny, who idolizes Derek, from following in his footsteps.

7.name: 7. The Big Lebowski
7.description: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

8.name: 8. The Faculty
8.description: When Casey Connor, Herrington High School's newspaper photographer, witnesses the murder of a nurse and sees her alive again, he decides to investigate the bizarre happenings.

9.name: 9. That '70s Show
9.description: A comedy revolving around a group of teenage friends, their mishaps, and their coming of age, set in 1970s Wisconsin.

10.name: 10. The Parent Trap
10.description: Identical twins Annie and Hallie, separated at birth and each raised by one of their biological parents, discover each other for the first time at summer camp and make a plan to bring their wayward parents back together.

11.name: 11. The King of Queens
11.description: Deliveryman Doug Heffernan has a good life: He has a pretty wife (Carrie), a big television, and friends with which to watch it. Then Carrie's goofy, annoying father Arthur moves in with them.

12.name: 12. Will & Grace
12.description: Gay lawyer Will and straight interior designer Grace share a New York City apartment. Their best friends are gleeful and proud gay Jack and charismatic, filthy-rich, amoral socialite Karen.

13.name: 13. Armageddon
13.description: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas will impact Earth in less than a month, NASA recruits a misfit team of deep-core drillers to save the planet.

14.name: 14. Dawson's Creek
14.description: Two childhood best friends, Dawson and Joey, go through different stages of adolescence together. Their friendship is later tested when they both start a relationship with different people.

15.name: 15. Meet Joe Black
15.description: Death, who takes the form of a young man killed in an accident, asks a media mogul to act as his guide to teach him about life on Earth and, in the process, he falls in love with the mogul's daughter.

16.name: 16. Two Guys, a Girl and a Pizza Place
16.description: Three twenty-somethings share a Boston apartment and hang around (and work) at a pizza place.

17.name: 17. Kaubôi bibappu
17.description: The futuristic misadventures and tragedies of an easygoing bounty hunter and his partners.

18.name: 18. Wild Things
18.description: A police detective uncovers a conspiracy behind a case involving a high-school guidance counselor when accusations of rape are made against him by two female students.

19.name: 19. Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
19.description: Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.

20.name: 20. Dark City
20.description: A man struggles with memories of his past, which include a wife he cannot remember and a nightmarish world no one else ever seems to wake up from.

21.name: 21. The Waterboy
21.description: A waterboy for a college football team discovers he has a unique tackling ability and becomes a member of the team.

22.name: 22. Deep Impact
22.description: A comet is discovered to be on a collision course with Earth. As doomsday nears, the human race prepares for the worst.

23.name: 23. A Bug's Life
23.description: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

24.name: 24. Enemy of the State
24.description: A lawyer becomes targeted by a corrupt politician and his N.S.A. goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a politically motivated crime.

25.name: 25. Practical Magic
25.description: Two witch sisters, raised by their eccentric aunts in a small town, face closed-minded prejudice and a curse which threatens to prevent them ever finding lasting love.
